scripts.deploy:patch: branch=$(git rev-parse --symbolic-full-name --abbrev-ref HEAD); if [[ $branch == "main" ]]; then (npm version patch && git push); else echo "not on main"; fi;
scripts.deploy:minor: branch=$(git rev-parse --symbolic-full-name --abbrev-ref HEAD); if [[ $branch == "main" ]]; then (npm version minor && git push); else echo "not on main"; fi;
scripts.deploy:major: branch=$(git rev-parse --symbolic-full-name --abbrev-ref HEAD); if [[ $branch == "main" ]]; then (npm version major && git push); else echo "not on main"; fi;
